channel.title: MYSQL register error
channel.description: whats wrong when try to creat new account in game i get this ---- Error: Unable to fill curstats ---- new forum acc is creating but when account in game i get this message ...

item.title: MYSQL register error
item.dc:creator: @universallas universallas
item.description:
@universallas wrote:

('".$db->escape($username_hash)."', '10', '3000', '0', '0'), ('".$db->escape($username_hash)."', '533', '25', '0', '1'), ('".$db->escape($username_hash)."', '77', '1', '0', '2') ") or error('Unable to fill curstats', __FILE__, __LINE__, $db->error());
it is ok now cuz i was made like that
('".$db->escape($username_hash)."', '10', '3000', '0', '0'), ('".$db->escape($username_hash)."', '533', '25', '0', '1'), ('".$db->escape($username_hash)."', '77', '1', '0', '2') ('".$db->escape($username_hash)."', '77', '1', '0', '2') ") or error('Unable to fill curstats', __FILE__, __LINE__, $db->error());

was in same inwentory 2 items … it is ok now
